For those with amount of time spent studying being much (A=1), the probability of level of understanding the material being good (B=1) is 0.6322. 
For those with level of understanding the material being poor (B=0) and amount of time spent studying being little (A=0), the probability of performance on a practice exam being excellent (C=1) is 0.8152.

For those with level of understanding the material being good (B=1) and amount of time spent studying being much (A=1), the probability of performance on a practice exam being excellent (C=1) is 0.9765. 
For those with amount of time spent studying being little (A=0), the probability of final exam score being high (D=1) is 0.5434. 
For those with amount of time spent studying being much (A=1), the probability of final exam score being high (D=1) is 0.8937.
